alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains; Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 26 at 3:15AM MST until December 27 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, except up to 12 inches over the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph could result in blowing snow. * WHERE...Owyhee Mountains and Southwest Highlands zones. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect breaks in snowfall today. Snowfall will increase tonight into Monday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
